comment: The main text box containing the characters and annotations from the 'Shuowen Jiezi' (说文解字) book. It includes columns of ancient Chinese characters (likely seal script), their associated numbers, and departmental classifications (e.g., '部三百'). The title '说文解字第十' is visible at the top right, indicating this is the tenth section of the work. The right margin contains vertical text including '小三百八', '說文十五上', '十三', and '嚴華', likely page or volume markers.
